game.name: Horse Manager
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Manage your own horse racing teams in Horse Manager. With charming retro ASCII graphics, buy, train, and race horses while making planned decisions to lead your teams to success.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Manage your own horse racing teams in Horse Manager. With charming retro ASCII graphics, buy, train, and race horses while making planned decisions to lead your teams to success.
